:orphan:



.. _sphx_glr_auto_examples:

Examples
==================

Below is a list of examples for various workflows using the MultiScaleOT library from python.
A convenient way to try them is via :ref:`Google colab <installation-google-colab>`.



.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="This example demonstrates on a simple 1-dimensional example the basic usage of the TMultiScaleS...">
